name: Kaivahue
description:
Soccer meets fighting!

It's a videogame sport in two dimensions, where the players competes each other in 1vs1 or 2vs2 match. The goal is to score against the enemy team.

Main Features

- Each character has a unique style and appeareance, like any fighting game.
- It supports differents controls (Keyboards, gamepads).
- The combination of stages/characters offers a lot of fun and different matches.
- Easy to play, there are only three buttons besides the directionals (Attack, Jump, Special).
- The characters besides punch the ball, they also can do a special move (different for each own).

CONTROLS

Player1:
Arrows (Up, Down, Left, Right) : Directionals.
U: Special
I: Jump
O: Attack.

Player 2:
WASD: Directionals.
V: Special.
B: Jump.
N: Attack

Any feedback is appreciated!
